code: import React,{useContext}from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{UserNameContext}from"../Context/Context";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Intro(){const{userName,setUserName}=useContext(UserNameContext);const navigate=useNavigate();function proceed(){userName===""?alert("Please fill in a name"):navigate("/info");return;}function updateName(event){setUserName(()=>{const{value}=event.target;return value;});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"intro",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{className:"intro--welcome",children:["Welcome to my first major ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("code",{children:"React"})," project"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"intro--h1",children:"Government Quiz App"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"intro--cta","aria-label":"userName",children:"Enter your first name and click the button below to continue"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{"aria-labelledby":"userName",className:"intro--name",name:"name",value:userName,onChange:updateName}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"intro--btn intro--link",onClick:proceed,children:"Submit"})]});}export default Intro;
